title: nil pointer leading to 0 sized .log file - leading to "seek: invalid argument"
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.9.1-stable-b7b2f60f`
OS & Version: Linux

#### Actual behaviour

This lead to a 0 bytes sized `geth/logs/19081804593853.log` file - which made geth unable to start:

`seek geth/logs/19081804593853.log: invalid argument`
We are removing the directory logger as part of removing the dashboard code.
